mapper.select: SELECT ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED FROM ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS OFFSET (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
SELECT ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED FROM ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS WHERE ATTENDANCEID = ${attendanceId}

SELECT ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED FROM ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS WHERE ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE = ${attendanceExceptionApplyDate} OFFSET (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED FROM ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS WHERE ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS = ${attendanceExceptionStatus} OFFSET (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY

SELECT ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED FROM ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS WHERE ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED = ${attendanceExceptionApproved} OFFSET (#{pageNo} - 1) * #{rowsPerPage} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{rowsPerPage} ROWS ONLY
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ATTENDANCES_EXCEPTIONS ( ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID, ATTENDANCEID, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPLYDATE, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONSTATUS, ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONAPPROVED ) VALUES ( SEQ_ATTENDANCEEXCEPTIONID.NEXTVAL, #{attendanceId}, #{attendanceExceptionApplyDate}, #{attendanceExceptionStatus}, #{attendanceExceptionApproved} )
